name: The Sullen Boku Girls Alliance
description:
The Sullen Boku Girls Alliance is an incredibly facetious and silly short RPG in which the protagonists of six separate original projects go on an errand in attempt to make their creator get to work on their stories. Hopefully their strong personalities won't be too much of an obstacle to their quest...!

The main characters of Uncommon Time and Refinery appear as party members, and there are a few jokes about their respective games, but you can probably still enjoy the story if you haven't played one or both of those.
